languages.text: {n}Маражай, тяжело дыша, оглядывает оставленный вами кровавый след. Его глаза подернуты маревом безумия, а губы растянуты в кривом оскале.{/n} "Прекрасно. Изысканно. Больше жертв, чем когда бы то ни было до сих пор... я доволен". {n}Он облизывается и переводит взгляд на вас.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Если Ascension равен 4 и меньше ИЛИ если у игрока 3 марка Хаоса

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай, тяжело дыша, оглядывает оставленный вами кровавый след. Его глаза подернуты маревом безумия, а губы растянуты в кривом оскале.{/n} "Прекрасно. Изысканно. Больше жертв, чем когда бы то ни было до сих пор... я доволен". {n}Он облизывается и переводит взгляд на вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋喘着粗气，将目光投向你身后留下的一串血迹。他的眼神有些呆滞，充满了疯狂，唇边挂着扭曲的笑容。{/n}“美极了，如此精妙，比以往更多的猎物……我很满足。”{n}他舔了舔嘴唇，目光落在你身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋喘着粗气，将目光投向你身后留下的一串血迹。他的眼神有些呆滞，充满了疯狂，唇边挂着扭曲的笑容。{/n}“美极了，如此精妙，比以往更多的猎物……我很满足。”{n}他舔了舔嘴唇，目光落在你身上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jadeando profusamente, Marazhai sigue con la mirada el rastro de sangre que has dejado a tu paso. Sus ojos están empañados por la locura y sus labios se han estirado en una sonrisa depravada.{/n} «Precioso. Exquisito. Más víctimas que nunca antes... estoy muy satisfecho». {n}Se relame y luego desvía su mirada hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jadeando profusamente, Marazhai sigue con la mirada el rastro de sangre que has dejado a tu paso. Sus ojos están empañados por la locura y sus labios se han estirado en una sonrisa depravada.{/n} «Precioso. Exquisito. Más víctimas que nunca antes... estoy muy satisfecho». {n}Se relame y luego desvía su mirada hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le souffle court, Marazhai contemple la traînée de sang que vous avez laissée sur votre passage. Son regard est empreint de folie et ses lèvres s'étirent en un rictus cruel.{/n} « Superbe. Exquis. Plus de victimes que jamais auparavant... Je suis satisfait. » {n}Il passe sa langue sur ses lèvres et tourne le regard vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le souffle court, Marazhai contemple la traînée de sang que vous avez laissée sur votre passage. Son regard est empreint de folie et ses lèvres s'étirent en un rictus cruel.{/n} « Superbe. Exquis. Plus de victimes que jamais auparavant... Je suis satisfait. » {n}Il passe sa langue sur ses lèvres et tourne le regard vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schwer atmend blickt Marazhai auf die Blutspur, die du hinterlassen hast. Sein Blick ist getrübt vor Wahnsinn und er grinst schief.{/n} "Schön. Exquisit. So viele Opfer wie nie zuvor ... Ich bin zufrieden." {n}Er leckt er sich die Lippen und wendet seinen Blick in deine Richtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schwer atmend blickt Marazhai auf die Blutspur, die du hinterlassen hast. Sein Blick ist getrübt vor Wahnsinn und er grinst schief.{/n} "Schön. Exquisit. So viele Opfer wie nie zuvor ... Ich bin zufrieden." {n}Er leckt er sich die Lippen und wendet seinen Blick in deine Richtung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは荒く息を吐きながら、あなたが残した血の跡に視線を投げかけている。彼の目は狂気でギラつき、唇には歪んだ笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「美しい。絶妙だ。かつてないほどの犠牲者…俺様は満たされている」{n}彼は唇を舐め、視線をあなたへと移す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは荒く息を吐きながら、あなたが残した血の跡に視線を投げかけている。彼の目は狂気でギラつき、唇には歪んだ笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「美しい。絶妙だ。かつてないほどの犠牲者…俺様は満たされている」{n}彼は唇を舐め、視線をあなたへと移す。{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Derin derin nefes alan Marazhai, bakışlarını ardında bıraktığın kan izine dikiyor. Gözleri çılgınlıkla kaplanıyor. Yayılan dudaklarında çarpık bir sırıtış ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Güzel. Fevkalade. Hiç olmadığı kadar kurbanımız var... Tatmin oldum." {n}Dudaklarını yalayarak bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai, breathing heavily, casts his gaze over the trail of blood you have left in your wake. His eyes are glazed with madness and his lips are stretched in a crooked grin.{/n} "Beautiful. Exquisite. More victims than ever before... I am satisfied." {n}He licks his lips and shifts his gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Derin derin nefes alan Marazhai, bakışlarını ardında bıraktığın kan izine dikiyor. Gözleri çılgınlıkla kaplanıyor. Yayılan dudaklarında çarpık bir sırıtma ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Güzel. Fevkalade. Hiç olmadığı kadar kurbanımız var... Tatmin oldum." {n}Dudaklarını yalayarak bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
